scripts.dev: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run start:dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run start:prod --prefix backend" "npm run start --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
